reviews.review: Very nice game. I love it.
Haven't finished it yet but it's great so far, though I hate the airboat with a burning passion. Fun shooting, rewarding and satisfactory puzzles with a little vehicle jank.

Absolutely great game, I may have played this game to late but the action is amazing and great, I mostly enjoyed the "Follow Freeman" and "Anticitizen One" for it's great action, but it's not the action that it's great but everything I recommend this game, and it must be a mustplay game.
Half Life i≈üte s√∂ze gerek yok

( very minor Spoilers idk)
After playing and loving the first game a few months ago i expected this to be amazing, but it ended up being a very disappointing and dull experience.
The story is non-existent and what is there is never explained (I still dont know what the villain's goal was or what even is a combine).
The gameplay is certainly fun but the cool parts of the game (physics puzzles, mudskipper. guiding antlions through Nova prospekt) don't make up for the neverending shooting galleries where the combine gather in the same small chokepoint to be destroyed by the player without any real fun.
Compared to the first game it really lacks enemy variety: the combine are always the same, they just change color and have a bit more health, but the ones you fight in the first chapter are the same you fight at the end.
I really wanted to like this game, but i sadly don't see how it is so renowned and loved

boring ugly gimmicky shit. The levels all are bland and samey, the story is beyond crap and was written by a group of chimps pretending to be edgar allen poe, the gunplay and mechanics have aged like shit and is monotonous beyond belief. The neckbeard community which suck off this overrated trash are honestly some of the worst people you can meet. Avoid this shit if you enjoy good games or having fun.
